2.8 Release

Version 2.8 continues to mature OSK along the following main tracks: Community App Demos and Videos Added a YouTube video that provides an overview of the Maintenance App Group and the script used in the video, demo_maint_mem_apps.rb, to the SimSat target procedures directory. 2.4 Released

The main purpose of this release is to upgrade to the latest 42 simulator version called “2042”. 42 version numbers are defined in 42/Docs/Revision.txt.
